#### Task 1
Create an R project for solving this Exercise Sheet. 

#### Task 2
Download the csv-file [SSRC_data.csv](data/SSRC_data.csv) and the rmd-file [SSRC_7_template.rmd](https://github.com/PHPtum/PHP_teaching_material/blob/main/SSRC_Material/C7_material/SSRC_C7_template.Rmd) and put it in the R project folder you created in Task 1.

#### Task 3 
Open the _SSRC_C7_template.rmd_ file.

#### Task 4
Open the model [C7 - Model Report HTML](C7_material/SSRC_C7_model.html) in your browser. Your task is to replicate this file by yourself with R Markdown. Complete the _SSRC_C7_template.rmd_ file to do so.
